根据手机号和密码查找管理员<-->
select * from xdh_admin where mobile = #{mobile} and password = #{password}
增加管理员日志<-->
insert into xdh_admin_log (admin_id,admin_name,content,add_time,add_ip) values (#{admin_id},#{admin_name},#{content},#{add_time},#{add_ip})
查找最新的五个管理员日志<-->
select * from xdh_admin_log order by add_time desc limit 5
